HediffDef.label: extra firing arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra firing arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hindrance than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra firing arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra firing arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hinderence than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra loping arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra loping arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hindrance than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra loping arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra loping arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hinderence than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra programmable arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra programmable limb. Its efficacy scales with the Intellectual skill of the user.\n\nUnlike other extra arms, this limb is sufficiently customizable that particularly adept users have no trouble at all with it.

HediffDef.label: extra programmable arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra programmable limb. Its efficacy scales with the Intellectual skill of the user.\n\nUnlike other extra arms, this limb is sufficiently customizable that particularly adept users have no trouble at all with it.

HediffDef.label: extra servo-shank arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra servo-shank arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hindrance than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra servo-shank arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra servo-shank arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hinderence than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra testudo arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra testudo arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hindrance than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra testudo arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra testudo arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hinderence than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra welding arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra welding arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hindrance than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra welding arm (right)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra welding arm.\n\nAs humans tend to lack experience using more than 2 arms, extra limbs start off as more of a hinderence than anything. They will incrementally improve over time. It takes up to a year to fully master them.

HediffDef.label: extra archotech programmable arm (left)
HediffDef.description: An installed extra archotech programmable arm. It functions like an ordinary limb, but is mostly composed of microscopic archites. Thus, its form and function can be redesigned in virtually limitless ways, so long as the host can accurately envision the end result.

RecipeDef.description: Install an extra archotech programmable arm (left).
